p:
The effectiveness of the plastic films expressed as antibacterial activity was calculated according to this Equation (3):
(3)
R =
U t
âˆ’

,
where R is antibacterial activity, U t is the average of the common logarithm of the number of viable bacteria (CFU/cm 2) recovered from the untreated sample (blank), and A t represents the average of the common logarithm of the number of viable bacteria (cells/cm 2), recovered from the treated test specimens after 24 h.
